quote: The best error message is the one that never shows up.
author: Thomas Fuchs

quote: Always code as if the guy who ends up maintaining your code will be a violent psychopath who knows where you live.
author: John Woods

quote: The most disastrous thing that you can ever learn is your first programming language.
author: Alan Kay

quote: Programming isn’t about what you know; it’s about what you can figure out.
author: Chris Pine

quote: The art of programming is the skill of controlling complexity.
author: Marijn Haverbeke

quote: A language that doesn't affect the way you think about programming is not worth knowing.
author: Alan Perlis

quote: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
author: Alan Kay

quote: The most important skill for a programmer is to learn how to learn.
author: John Ousterhout

quote: Code is like humor. When you have to explain it, it’s bad.
author: Cory House

quote: Every great developer you know got there by solving problems they were unqualified to solve until they actually did it.
author: Patrick McKenzie

quote: Simplicity is the soul of efficiency.
author: Austin Freeman

quote: Measuring programming progress by lines of code is like measuring aircraft building progress by weight.
author: Bill Gates

quote: Programming is the closest thing we have to a superpower.
author: Drew Houston

quote: Don't comment bad code—rewrite it.
author: Brian W. Kernighan

quote: The function of good software is to make the complex appear to be simple.
author: Grady Booch

quote: First, solve the problem. Then, write the code.
author: John Johnson

quote: Learning to code is useful no matter what your career ambitions are.
author: Arianna Huffington

quote: In software, the only constant is change.
author: Anonymous

quote: If debugging is the process of removing software bugs, then programming must be the process of putting them in.
author: Edsger Dijkstra

quote: Software is a great combination of artistry and engineering.
author: Bill Gates

quote: The computer was born to solve problems that did not exist before.
author: Bill Gates

quote: Talk is cheap. Show me the code.
author: Linus Torvalds

quote: Don’t worry if it doesn’t work right. If everything did, you’d be out of a job.
author: Mosher’s Law of Software Engineering

quote: Good code is its own best documentation.
author: Steve McConnell

quote: The most important aspect of a software is its ability to be maintained.
author: Meir M.

quote: Coding is not just code, but it's a way to solve problems.
author: Anitha Vadavatha

quote: Optimism is an occupational hazard of programming: feedback is the treatment.
author: Kent Beck

quote: Perfection is achieved not when there is nothing more to add, but rather when there is nothing more to take away.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quote: The most effective debugging tool is still careful thought, coupled with judiciously placed print statements.
author: Brian W. Kernighan

quote: You might not think that programmers are artists, but programming is an extremely creative profession. It’s logic-based creativity.
author: John Romero

quote: If you optimize everything, you will always be unhappy.
author: Donald Knuth

quote: The only way to learn a new programming language is by writing programs in it.
author: Dennis Ritchie

quote: When in doubt, use brute force.
author: Ken Thompson

quote: Programming is not a zero-sum game. Teaching something to a fellow programmer doesn’t take it away from you.
author: John Carmack

quote: Any code of your own that you haven't looked at for six or more months might as well have been written by someone else.
author: Eagleson's Law

quote: I'm not a great programmer; I'm just a good programmer with great habits.
author: Kent Beck

quote: Don’t worry about people stealing your ideas. If your ideas are any good, you’ll have to ram them down people’s throats.
author: Howard Aiken

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: A clever person solves a problem. A wise person avoids it.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Walking on water and developing software from a specification are easy if both are frozen.
author: Edward V. Berard

quote: Don’t write better error messages, write code that doesn’t need them.
author: Jason C. McDonald

quote: Software is like sex: it’s better when it’s free.
author: Linus Torvalds

quote: Good software, like wine, takes time.
author: Joel Spolsky

quote: The trouble with programmers is that you can never tell what a programmer is doing until it’s too late.
author: Seymour Cray

quote: The most important part of writing a program is designing the data structures.
author: Dan Bricklin

quote: Make it work, make it right, make it fast.
author: Kent Beck

quote: Computer science education cannot make anybody an expert programmer any more than studying brushes and pigment can make somebody an expert painter.
author: Eric S. Raymond

quote: Most software today is very much like an Egyptian pyramid with millions of bricks piled on top of each other, with no structural integrity, but just done by brute force and thousands of slaves.
author: Alan Kay

quote: Without requirements or design, programming is the art of adding bugs to an empty text file.
author: Louis Srygley

quote: The most damaging phrase in the language is: 'It’s always been done that way.'
author: Grace Hopper

quote: The function of good software is to make the complex appear to be simple.
author: Grady Booch

quote: Every great developer you know got there by solving problems they were unqualified to solve until they actually did it.
author: Patrick McKenzie

quote: Simplicity is the soul of efficiency.
author: Austin Freeman

quote: Measuring programming progress by lines of code is like measuring aircraft building progress by weight.
author: Bill Gates
